text: Pierre-Antoine-Jean Bach (29 July 1932 - 26 June 2020) was a French-born Laotian Roman Catholic bishop. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1959. He was the Roman Catholic bishop of the Apostolic Vicariate of Savannakhet. Laos, from 1971 to 1975.Apostolic Vicariate of Savvannekhet Bach died on 26 June 2020, aged 87.Bishop Pierre-Antoine-Jean Bach ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French Roman Catholic bishops Category:Laotian people
title: Pierre-Antoine-Jean Bach
